title: 求一个配置要求稍微低一点的口袋妖怪mod
author: loli智乃

replies.author: 天蝎_心殇
replies.txt_content:
[1.8-1.7.2][Pixelmon——精灵宝可梦]4.2.7
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-291020-1-1.html

模组并没有高配低配之分啦

replies.author: 时透无一年
replies.txt_content:
##########################################################################################################
# graphics
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
# Graphics Settings
##########################################################################################################

graphics {
    # Use the smd normal maps for shading pokeballs
    B:"Enable smooth shading for pokeballs"=false

    # Use the smd normal maps for shading pokemon
    B:"Enable smooth shading for pokemon"=false

    # Multiplier of the 64 distance usually used for rendering
    D:"Render Distance Weight"=2.0

    # Display the currently selected pokemon's attack target on the screen
    B:"Show current attack target"=true

    # Use the low-res (256x256) pokemon and pokeball textures
    B:"Use low-res Textures"=true

    # Use original pokemon textures for statues
    B:"Use original pokemon textures for statues"=false
}复制代码
配置文件里根据需求调整这些可以降低配置要求

replies.author: 晓兜
replies.txt_content:
这个Mod是不分高配和低配的


[1.8-1.7.2][Pixelmon——精灵宝可梦]4.2.7
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-291020-1-1.html

带起来卡的话就换一个配置好一些电脑吧
